43
44 1.​·​The·​purpose·​of·​this·​Agreement·​is·​to·​[enhance·​the·​implementation·​of·​the·​Convention·​and·​to·​achieve·​its·​objective][further·​implement·​the·​objective·​of·​the·​Convention·​set·​out·​in·​its·​Article·​2·​[through·​enhanced·​action,​·​cooperation·​and·​support]]·​so·​as:​
45
46 ·​·​·​·​1.​·​To·​hold·​the·​increase·​in·​the·​global·​average·​temperature·​to
47
48 ·​·​·​·​·​·​·​·​**Option·​1:​**·​below·​2·​°C·​above·​pre-​industrial·​levels,​
49
50 ·​·​·​·​·​·​·​·​**Option·​2:​**·​well·​below·​2°C·​above·​pre-​industrial·​levels·​[and·​to·​[rapidly]·​scale·​up·​global·​efforts·​to·​limit·​temperature·​increase·​to·​below·​1.​5·​°C]·​[,​while·​recognizing·​that·​in·​some·​regions·​and·​vulnerable·​ecosystems·​high·​risks·​are·​projected·​even·​for·​warming·​above·​1.​5·​°C],​
51
52 ·​·​·​·​·​·​·​·​**Option·​3:​**·​below·​1.​5°C·​above·​pre-​industrial·​levels,​
53 ·​·​·​taking·​into·​account·​the·​best·​available·​science,​·​equity,​·​sustainable·​development,​·​the·​need·​to·​ensure·​food·​security·​and·​the·​availability·​of·​means·​of·​implementation,​·​by·​ensuring·​deep·​reductions·​in·​global·​greenhouse·​gas·​[net]·​emissions;​
54
55 ·​·​·​·​2.​·​To·​increase·​their·​ability·​to·​adapt·​to·​the·​adverse·​impacts·​of·​climate·​change·​[and·​to·​effectively·​respond·​to·​the·​impacts·​of·​the·​implementation·​of·​response·​measures·​and·​to·​loss·​and·​damage];​
56
57 ·​·​·​·​3.​·​To·​pursue·​sustainable·​development·​in·​a·​manner·​that·​fosters·​climate·​resilience·​and·​low·​greenhouse·​gas·​emissions,​·​and·​that·​does·​not·​threaten·​food·​production·​and·​distribution;​
58
59 ·​·​·​·​4.​·​To·​make·​finance·​flows·​consistent·​with·​a·​pathway·​towards·​low-​emission·​and·​climate-​resilient·​development,​·​in·​the·​context·​of·​sustainable·​development·​priorities·​and·​efforts·​to·​eradicate·​poverty.​
60
